name: MMGP
description: User Interface for the Multitarget Multiagent Geospatial Pathfinding project

scripts.build: cd ../addons/group && node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure build && cd ../route && node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure build && cd ../../app/
scripts.rebuild: cd ../addons/group && node-gyp rebuild --target=2.0.5 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/electron && cd ../route && node-gyp rebuild --target=2.0.5 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/electron && cd ../../app/
